data.comment: The big names in today's match at Sardegna Arena have now been confirmed.
Today's referee, Davide Ghersini, has blown to start the match.
In the minute 1, Davide Ghersini signals a Juventus throw-in in Cagliari's half.
Cagliari drives forward and Luca Gagliano gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Cagliari close to the penalty box.
In the minute 4, Cagliari to take a throw-in in Juventus territory.
Juventus pushes forward through Simone Muratore, whose finish on goal is saved.
In Cagliari a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 6, Throw-in Cagliari.
Gonzalo Higuain for Juventus drives towards goal at Sardegna Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Luca Gagliano scores to make it 1-0 at Sardegna Arena.
In the minute 8, Federico Mattiello with an assist there.
Can Juventus get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cagliari's half?
Corner awarded to Juventus.
In the minute 10, Juventus's Juan Cuadrado misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Cagliari goal kick.
Free kick for Juventus in their own half.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Juventus at Sardegna Arena.
The match at Sardegna Arena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Joao Pedro, who is down injured.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 13, Cagliari's Joao Pedro is back in action after a slight knock.
Cagliari's Federico Mattiello is on target but unsuccessful.
Cagliari have been awarded a corner by Davide Ghersini.
In the minute 15, It's a goal kick for the away team in Cagliari.
Cristiano Ronaldo for Juventus is whistled offside.
Marko Rog (Cagliari) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 17, Juventus awarded a free kick in their own half.
Davide Ghersini signals a free kick to Juventus in their own half.
Joao Pedro of Cagliari smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 18, Free kick for Cagliari in their own half.
Cristiano Ronaldo (Juventus) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Davide Ghersini awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 20, Davide Ghersini signals a free kick to Cagliari in their own half.
Throw-in for Cagliari in their own half.
Juventus's Rodrigo Bentancur gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 22, Goal kick for Cagliari at Sardegna Arena.
Ball safe as Juventus is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 24, Cristiano Ronaldo (Juventus) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick Cagliari.
Miralem Pjanic is booked for the away team.
Cagliari awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 31, Juventus push forward at Sardegna Arena and Cristiano Ronaldo gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Cagliari defence.
Corner awarded to Juventus.
Leonardo Bonucci of Juventus gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 32, Davide Ghersini awards Cagliari a goal kick.
Juventus advance rapidly upfield but Davide Ghersini blows for offside.
Throw-in for Juventus in the half of Cagliari.
In the minute 34, Juventus's Rodrigo Bentancur gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Cagliari defender.
Free kick for Juventus in the half of Cagliari.
In Cagliari, Cristiano Ronaldo of Juventus is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 38, Juventus have been awarded a corner by Davide Ghersini.
In Cagliari Juventus attack through Gonzalo Higuain. The finish is off target, however.
Cagliari have a goal kick.
In the minute 39, Free kick for Cagliari in their own half.
Juventus awarded a free kick in their own half.
Juventus's Juan Cuadrado breaks free at Sardegna Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 41, Goal kick for Cagliari at Sardegna Arena.
Federico Bernardeschi (Juventus) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Juventus to take a throw-in in Cagliari territory.
In the minute 43, Davide Ghersini signals a free kick to Cagliari in their own half.
Throw-in for Juventus at Sardegna Arena.
Juventus's Rodrigo Bentancur gets in a shot on goal at Sardegna Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, Juventus have a dangerous throw-in.
Juventus are coming forward and Cristiano Ronaldo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Cagliari.
In the minute 45, Davide Ghersini will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Throw-in for Cagliari in their own half.
Juventus drive upfield and Federico Bernardeschi gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Cagliari defender.
Cagliari will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Juventus.
In the minute 45, Juventus are pushing forward but Miralem Pjanic's finish is wide of the goal.
Davide Ghersini awards Cagliari a goal kick.
The first-half has come to a close in Cagliari.
Giovanni Simeone puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 2-0.
In the minute 45, Great play from Luca Gagliano to set up the goal.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Sardegna Arena.
Important block from the Cagliari defence as Cristiano Ronaldo fires in a strike for Juventus.
In the minute 46, Gonzalo Higuain (Juventus) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Babis Lykogiannis is on a sub for Luca Gagliano for Cagliari.
Throw-in for Juventus in the half of Cagliari.
Cagliari make their second substitution with Alberto Paloschi replacing Marko Rog.
In the minute 48, Davide Ghersini signals a Juventus throw-in in Cagliari's half.
Free kick Juventus.
Joao Pedro for Cagliari gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 50, Juventus have a goal kick.
Cagliari drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Juventus drive upfield and Simone Muratore gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Cagliari defender.
In the minute 51, In Cagliari Cagliari drive forward through Giovanni Simeone. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Simone Muratore gets his shot on target but fails to score for Juventus.
Juventus have been awarded a corner by Davide Ghersini.
In the minute 54, Juventus push upfield and Alex Sandro gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Cagliari defence.
In Cagliari a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball goes out of play for a Cagliari goal kick.
In the minute 55, Davide Ghersini awards the home team a throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Cagliari.
Cagliari awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 57, Federico Bernardeschi (Juventus) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Cagliari goal kick.
Can Cagliari get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Juventus's half?
In the minute 59, Davide Ghersini signals a free kick to Cagliari.
Cristiano Ronaldo (Juventus) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Juventus are whistled for offside.
In the minute 61, The away team replace Simone Muratore with Blaise Matuidi.
Luca Zanimacchia is replacing Miralem Pjanic for the away team.
In the minute 62, Throw-in Cagliari.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Juventus in the half of Cagliari.
Corner awarded to Juventus.
Federico Bernardeschi for Juventus gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 65, Cagliari have a goal kick.
In the minute 65, Cagliari's Joao Pedro has been booked in Cagliari.
Ball safe as Juventus is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Cagliari awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 67, Free kick for Juventus in their own half.
Juventus drives forward and Cristiano Ronaldo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Ball safe as Cagliari is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 68, Throw-in Cagliari.
Cagliari awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Cagliari's Giovanni Simeone gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Juventus defender.
In the minute 70, Cagliari's Giovanni Simeone breaks free at Sardegna Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Juventus at Sardegna Arena.
Throw-in for Cagliari in their own half.
In the minute 74, Davide Ghersini signals a free kick to Cagliari in their own half.
Rodrigo Bentancur (Juventus) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Juventus have been awarded a corner by Davide Ghersini.
In the minute 76, Can Juventus capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Daouda Peeters is replacing Rodrigo Bentancur for Juventus at Sardegna Arena.
Cristiano Ronaldo (Juventus) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 77, Corner awarded to Juventus.
Cagliari awarded a free kick in their own half.
Davide Ghersini awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 79, Davide Ghersini awards Cagliari a goal kick.
Cristiano Ronaldo for Juventus drives towards goal at Sardegna Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Cagliari at Sardegna Arena.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Juventus in the half of Cagliari.
Goal kick for Cagliari at Sardegna Arena.
Luca Zanimacchia (Juventus) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 82, Corner awarded to Juventus.
Free kick for Cagliari in their own half.
Juventus are pushing forward but Federico Bernardeschi's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 84, Cagliari have a goal kick.
Juventus awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Cagliari make their third substitution with Valter Birsa replacing Giovanni Simeone.
In the minute 85, Davide Ghersini signals a free kick to Juventus in their own half.
In Cagliari Juventus drive forward through Alex Sandro. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for Juventus at Sardegna Arena.
In the minute 86, Juventus are caught offside.
Cagliari's Joao Pedro misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Cagliari.
In the minute 88, Maurizio Sarri (Juventus) is making a fourth substitution, with Marco Olivieri replacing Gonzalo Higuain.
Gaston Pereiro is on a sub for Joao Pedro for Cagliari.
Ball safe as Juventus is awarded a throw-in in their half.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Cagliari in their own half.
Juventus have been awarded a corner by Davide Ghersini.
Can Juventus capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cagliari's half?
Throw-in Cagliari.
Luca Zanimacchia of Juventus smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Davide Ghersini signals a throw-in for Juventus, close to Cagliari's area.
Alessio Cragno is back on his feet again.
In Cagliari Cagliari attack through Alberto Paloschi. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Juventus goal kick.
The match is over. Final score 2-0.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Alessio Cragno.
